key_phrases: the process seemed quite loose and unstructured
use of grant funds requirements were not communicated to my organization in a timely or clear manner
a designated staff person or team to help folks walk through the process
provided to us for the application process; but not after actually receiving the grant
left us scrambling at the last moments to stay in compliance
barriers_identified: unclear and untimely communication of grant requirements
solutions_proposed: assign a designated staff person or team to assist grantees after award
